attributes.action: End the underhand sleazy hidden tax hikes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reduce the duty level back to where it was on ALL the items that had a duty INCREASE for the lower vat period, not to do so has proved to be a shabby hidden tax hike by this spendaholic Government who's propensity to waste public money is an utter disgrace, stop the tax hikes, cut out the waste and do it NOW.
